text: phu sraththa thanghlay! Cng raluk thung khwam kruna khx ngxallxh thi mi tx phwk cea khna thi phk w hnung plngcı thi ca yunmux khxng phwk khea ma tharay phwk cea læw phraxngkh k thrng yabyang læa hanhe mux nph wk khea xxk cak phwk cea seiy læa phung ya ke rng xallxh theid læa tæ xallxh theanan phu sraththa thanghlay cng mxbhmay
